Description: Unique code to identify the full taxonomic name. This usually consists of the first four letters of the genus and first three letters of the species.
Description of the wild/domestic status, including combination categories (wild & domestic) as well as inderterminate categories (wild/domestic)
Higher level common taxonomic classification e.g. 'amphibia', 'bat', 'bird'. Useful in analysis where only land mammals, for example, want to be included.
